definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: I gave him a New Year card, which he enjoyed very much.
sentences.chinese: 我給他一張賀年卡，他很喜歡它。

sentences.english: And obviously we all send out Christmas card and New Year's card at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 當然，我們還將聖誕卡和賀年卡一起發出去。

sentences.english: I still cannot put my finger on who wrote me that card.
sentences.chinese: 說了這麼多，我還是不能確定那張賀年卡是誰寄來的。

sentences.english: Folded New Year card should be sent as a letter.
sentences.chinese: 摺疊的賀年卡應該按信函交寄。

definition: Bismarck (name)/Otto von Bismarck (1815-1898), Prussian politician, Minister-President of Prussia 1862-1873, Chancellor of Germany 1871-1890
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
to judge between right and wrong/to reason things out
lit. to lead away a goat while passing by (idiom)/fig. to opportunistically pocket sb's possessions and walk off
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
